name: Racket Source Code File
summary: Learn about .RKT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Racket is used in scripting, computer science education, research, and general-purpose programming. It is designed to provide capabilities beyond the Scheme and Lisp languages in which it is based. Some of its features include the ability to link components written in various dialects and libraries that support a variety of applications such as web servers and databases.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
